content.html: For folks moving off Heroku: right now, the two leaders IMO are @flydotio and @render. Render is probably most "Heroku-like" in being automatic, but that means less flexibility. Fly tries to do less, so is harder to get started, but is more flexible and an amazing building block.
content.value: For folks moving off Heroku: right now, the two leaders IMO are @flydotio and @render. Render is probably most "Heroku-like" in being automatic, but that means less flexibility. Fly tries to do less, so is harder to get started, but is more flexible and an amazing building block.
